name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 24, a fire broke out in the Great Buddha Hall of Shandan County Dafo Temple, which was under repair in Shandan County, Zhangye City, Gansu Province. As of 10:00 a.m. on the 24th, the fire had been extinguished and no casualties were caused. The cause of the fire is under investigation.

content:
Netizen contribution
On July 25, in Nanjing, Jiangsu, a woman was fined for drinking water in a subway car.
Nanjing Metro responded that eating and drinking are prohibited on trains, and drinking water is also a kind of drink. If found, corresponding penalties will be imposed.

content: Wang Yi appointed Minister of Foreign Affairs

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The meeting dismissed Qin Gang from the post of foreign minister and appointed Wang Yi as foreign minister.
Subsequently, Xi Jinping signed the Presidential Order

name: 李老师不是你老师

name: 李老师不是你老师
